WorkItem.Description:
Caridean Epaulettes
http://www.wowhead.com/item=55204 (reg)
http://www.wowhead.com/item=56273 (heroic)
Â 
Are you going to add a feature to allow us to force update the item cache from wowhead or something individually?  Perhaps come up with a way to allow for a crowd sourcing method of correcting and updating the item cache.  Seems like this was an issue with Rawr2 as well.  Bad item caches can make the tool just as unreliable as a bad model.  Like this item which is in the upper tier of bear shoulders pre-raid in Cata that was completely missing.

Comments.Message: Clarification...update en mass, I know you can import items individually, but that only helps when you find an item that's missing not one that you don't know about that should be suggested to you.
I am closing this since I made sure this was inputted into the latest update I did this morning. It will be available in the next release.

Rawr is never 'missing' any items. 

You can add any items you want. You can update any items you want from Wowhead. You will soon be able to update all items at once from Wowhead. We'll soon add Battle.net item support as well. You can reset your itemcache to the global default one, which we update frequently.

I'm not really sure if that answers what you're asking. Please clarify if it doesn't.
